desc: Alric is a Product Manager, overseeing the development and continuous improvement of our platform features. They ensure that the platform meets the needs of both experts and users, from session booking to AI-driven insights.

Chariot is our Lead Developer, responsible for the technical architecture of the platform. They ensure seamless integration of features like AI transcription and real-time video processing to deliver a top-notch user experience.

Nathanil is a UX/UI Designer, creating intuitive and engaging user interfaces for both the experts and clients. Their designs ensure that every feature, from booking to session playback, is easy to use and visually appealing.

Agnes is a Data Scientist who specializes in developing the AI models that power our transcription and summarization features. Their work ensures that users get accurate, real-time insights from every session.

Vita is our Customer Success Manager, ensuring that both experts and clients have a smooth experience on our platform. From onboarding to troubleshooting, Vita’s role is crucial in maintaining high user satisfaction.

Donna leads our Marketing Team, crafting strategies to attract both experts and clients to our platform. Through targeted campaigns, Donna ensures that our platform’s unique value proposition reaches the right audience.

Sergei is the Chief Technology Officer (CTO), guiding the overall technological strategy of the platform. Sergei’s leadership ensures that we stay ahead with cutting-edge technologies and that the platform scales smoothly.

Claudetta is a User Researcher, gathering and analyzing feedback from users to help shape the future development of our platform. Their insights ensure that we continually improve and meet the evolving needs of our user base.

Vern is a Sales Manager, responsible for bringing new experts onto the platform. He works closely with potential clients to demonstrate the benefits of hosting their sessions with us, driving platform growth.

Mimi is the Operations Manager, ensuring that day-to-day activities on the platform run smoothly. From managing session schedules to overseeing user support, Mimi keeps the platform efficient and reliable.
